head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CHERMAYEFF, BARBARA M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CHERMAYEFF, BARBARA M.

block.p: CHERMAYEFF-Barbara M., Truro, Massachusetts, June 4, 2000, Barbara M. sister of Jocelyn Lebrun of Belgium. Mother of Ivan Chermayeff of New York, NY and Peter Chermayeff of Arlington, MA. Also survived by six grandchildren & five great grandchildren. A graveside burial is scheduled for August. Memorial donations can be made in Barbara M. Chermayeff name: W.W.F. World Wildlife Fund, 1250 Twenty-Fourth St. N.W. P.O. Box 97180, Washington D.C. 20037 www.panda.org
